song.title: Jesus Loves Me
song.lyrics:
[1] .C Am7 F2 I was lost, I was in chains . Gsus2 G C The world had a hold of me .C Am7 F2 My heart was a stone, I was covered in shame . G When He came for me
[P] .C Am7 I couldn't run, couldn't run from His presence .F2 G I couldn't run, couldn't run from His arms
[C] .C Am7 Jesus, He loves me . F2 G He loves me, He is for me .C Am7 Jesus, how can it be . F2 G (C) He loves me, He is for me
--- [2] .C Am7 F2 It was a fire, deep in my soul . Gsus2 G I'll never be the same .C Am7 F2 I stepped out of the dark, into the light . Gsus2 G When he called my name
[B] .Am7 F He holds the stars, and He holds my heart .C G/B With healing hands, that bear the scars .Am7 F The rugged Cross, where He died for me .C G My only hope, my everything
